name: Cyberstream Fugitive (Canceled)
blurb: Escape from the clutches of the evil Free to Play overlords and free Cyberstream once and for all.

rewards.reward: BACKER - get our thanks and your name into the credits of the game.
1 - THE GIVE ME THE GAME REWARD! \r\nReceive a copy of Cyberstream Fugitive when it is released later this year on Windows or Mac, DRM-free.
2 - THE GIVE ME THE GAME NOW REWARD!\r\n\r\nSame as the first reward except you get access to a Windows or Mac build of the game during the development as and when you want.

THE IOS VERSION! get the development version of the game that runs on iPhone and iPad. It's only been tested on iPhone 4s upwards so far and on iOS 6. You'll also get the final version once it's released.

THE CREATIVE SHADER BOOK REWARD! I keep getting asked to write a book on making shaders so if you back this reward then I will write that book and you will get a copy of it while I write it as well as the final copy when it is finished. It will be an eBook. You will also get a copy of the game for Windows or Mac when it's released.
3 - THE OST REWARD! You get the same as reward #2 but you also get the soundtrack of the game as it currently stands and updates when new music is created.
4 - LIMITED EDITION CODER ART POSTER! You get the same as reward #2 but you also get a limited edition poster made by me and signed! You also get your name in the credits of the game.

5 - THE DESIGN A BADDIE REWARD\r\n\r\nWant to get something you designed into the game? If so, this is the reward for you. As well as your design being turned into a 3D baddie for the game you will get the same rewards as 4 but featuring your Baddie!

THE GAVIN HARRISON SOUNDS MUSIC REWARD Gavin Harrison, the amazingly talented artist who is composing all the music and sound effects for Cyberstream Fugitive has agreed that for the £55 reward tier, not only do you get the OST for Cyberstream Fugitive but he will compose a unique 1 minute track for you or for your game. This is an amazing offer from an amazingly talented artist. Gavin's music is used on Films, TV and games and you would never see this kind of offer anywhere else. Gavin's work is worth at least 100 times £55 but he has kindly volunteered to do this to help my campaign. Don't miss this opportunity.

You can find more about Gavin on his site: http://gavinharrisonsounds.com

If you want him to write more than a minutes worth of music then pledge more than £55 but select the "Gavin Harrison Sounds music reward" tier. Once this project is backed with the full amount you will be put in touch with Gavin and he will go over the specification for the track and take it from there. Gavin is an highly sought after artist though so the amount of time he can spend on each track will be limited, especially if all 20 of this reward get taken.

7 - THE STUDENT SOURCE CODE REWARD!

You get the same as reward #2 but you also get a copy of the source code to the game when I get proof you are a student and you sign a  non-disclosure agreement saying you will not distribute the code or release a game made from it.

Please only select this reward if you are a Student!

8 - THE SOURCE CODE REWARD!

You get the same as reward #2 but you also get a copy of the source code to the game when you sign a non-disclosure agreement saying you will not distribute the code or release a game made from it. 
If you are a student, go for reward #7 instead!
9 - THE SOURCE CODE AND SKYPE REWARD! \r\n\r\nYou get the same as reward #7 but you also get my Skype address so you can ask me any questions about the game, the code or just want to chat.

THE MAIN BAD GUY - I need the main bad guy for the game. This is the antagonist that will taunt you and monologue at you during the game and appears as an avatar over the world. This is your chance to be that antagonist. Choose this reward and not only do you get a copy of the game, the source code and your name in the credits but you also get to appear in the game, your face there, immortalised forever. You don't have to look evil to but it would help!

10 - THE SOURCE CODE, SKYPE AND NANDOS REWARD! You get the same as reward #8 \r\n\r\nYou'll also get to come with me to a Nando's in London for a meal - I love the Nando's! Of course the meal will be on me.

11 - THE ULTIMATE REWARD!\r\n\r\nYou get all of the rewards including the source code (on signing a non-disclosure agreement) and you also get me working on your game for a month from my studio, or yours if it's in commutable distance from mine. If you want me to give you all my knowledge of Unity or simply want me to work on the code for your game during that month then this is the tier for you.
